column1: Have you noticed that dating has become more creative and romantic during the #coronavirus pandemic? I weighed in on this trend in the @JewishJournal. It's on p. 32 in tomorrow's print edition, and here's the link to the story. https://jewishjournal.com/culture/314865/jewish-dating-experts-say-coronavirus-infected-us-with-romance/ #covid19 #dating #love
